description.lang: The Nexia One Touch is a wall controller device that can act as a central scene controller or a traditional stand-alone scene controller.The Nexia One Touch contains up to 15 different scenes organized in 3 pages of screen where each page contains 5 scenes.The Nexia One Touch conveniently runs up to 15 modes and automations with the tap of a button.
